name: storm-drain

effect.black-white: Redirects water moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost. Does not redirect hidden power.
effect.black-2-white-2: Redirects water moves without negating them or granting any Special Attack boost. Does not redirect hidden power.

short_effect: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pok√©mon where possible. Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
